description.value: Little more than a leather cup attached to a pair of straps, a sling can be used to fling smooth stones or sling bullets at a range.
description.label: Description

description.value: These are small metal balls, typically either iron or lead, designed to be used as ammunition in slings.
description.label: Description

description.value: This leather armor is reinforced with metal studs and sometimes small metal plates, providing most of the flexibility of leather armor with more robust protection.
description.label: Description

description.value: You knock the target away from you up to 10 feet (you choose the distance). This is forced movement.
description.label: Description

description.value: The ruffian's brutality shakles foes' confidence. When the ruffian deals damage on a critical hit, the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} 1, and the ruffian can knock the target up to 10 feet away (this is forced movement).

Trigger: The ruffian has one hand free, and its target is within reach of that hand.

Effect: The ruffian makes a melee @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike} while keeping one hand free. If this @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike} hits, the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} until the start of the ruffian's next turn or until it leaves the ruffian's reach, whichever comes first.
The ruffian deals an extra [[/r 1d6 #precision]] precision damage to @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} creatures.
